= Introduction =

This class provides some useful Google Earth plugin helper methods.

It makes extensive use of Named and optional arguments to allow a high level of flexibility when working with the methods. Named and optional arguments, along with support for dynamic objects greatly improve the interoperability with the Google Earth Plugin.

For detailed information on named/optional Arguments' please see: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd264739.aspx
